Let's talk concentration

The ratios in the blend are the greatest factor in the strength and classification of a scent.

The lightest formula of all—a splash of fragrance for anyone who likes to apply their scent liberally.

Lighter still, this bottle blend is a lower concentration that is a bit more subtle, delicate and refreshing.

A moderate concentration, softer but strong enough to be distinct and alluring.

Lighter than perfume, but still one of the more concentrated blends—

The most pure and powerful bottle blend—the notes of your fragrance linger longer and the allure has a farther reach.

less intense more intense
